website_summaries.verdict: The Galaxy S3 is the best phones we've seen so far this year. Samsung matches great hardware and software with outstanding battery life, making it a very tough phone to beat.
cons: Photo quality is a small step back from the GS2

customer_reviews.title: No warranty on this phone
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Galaxy s3 i9300 and there was an issue with the phone. I was not able to get data on the phone and the roaming did not work. They didn't work because the menu option was not on the phone at all. When I tried to get support I found out that this phone was not made in USA but in Hong Kong and that is where I go for support. I have tried around the clock however, there is not chat available or phone number or even an email address. Yes this phone has a one year warranty and I just opened the box but I am out of luck. Don't buy this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: I have nothing I dislike about the phone other than after several years my battery dies quick in the charging port doesn't work anymore so I bought some extra batteries and an external charger no big deal I have had it for 3 years now and I think it may be time to upgrade
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Jones

customer_reviews.title: Fast, unlocked bootloader
customer_reviews.text: I definitely recommend this phone. It's fast, the screen is great. It comes with the same bloatware that's installed on most phones these days, but Samsung did us a favor by shipping with an unlocked bootloader, so if you're technically skilled you can install Cyanogenmod on it. It can run Jellybean or ICS this way. The two that we received are both the unlocked I9300 international versions. I would be quite unhappy if I ordered it and received the locked AT&T version as some reviewers here are describing.
customer_reviews.author: TheDude

customer_reviews.title: Good packaging and good condition at arrival
customer_reviews.text: This is the first mobile phone i have ordered through Amazon. The phone came a day later ( the shipping company said it will come through express service). None the less, the phone was in excellent condition and its working just fine. The price of it was lesser than found on most sites, so I was a bit concerned about its quality, but I am totally satisfied with the service.
customer_reviews.author: Anwar

customer_reviews.title: Galaxy S3 Review
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone because I like being untethered as opposed to the iphone total lock down. Looking at it online it seemed a little big but after I got it in realised how sleek and nice it feels in the hand and pocket. It is really fast, smooth and feature rich. As with all android phones it is supported by 600,0000 applications. This is like. The best part about this is that all the features now available on the iphone 5 were on the galaxy long before. Most people don't realise but the iphone is actually behind in terms of features. It you want features and to be untethered get this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Jermaine

customer_reviews.title: Definately go for it
customer_reviews.text: The Samsung Galaxy S III is one of the best smart phones available. This is a truly unlocked version with latest android updates readily available. You don't have to wait for AT&T to release the update. The only problem is this is not 4G LTE. Its 3G and I am ok with that. The customer service is extremely good and they put forth the facts honestly! Also don't worry about the phone starting in German, You just have to select English language and it is as good as any other S III
customer_reviews.author: Prabodh

customer_reviews.title: not new
customer_reviews.text: i ordered ceramic white but got marble white.it should be factory unlocked but my sim is not working in that.also the s" button written in samsung" on the back of phone is ripped of.screen protector was attached when i got the phone. t mobile logo appears when i turn on the phone. i completely don't trust its a new phone. this is totally insane. totally wrong product.
customer_reviews.author: tz

customer_reviews.title: scam!
customer_reviews.text: I would rate it with negative stars if they were any... The phone i got looked great from the outside and i was so happy to get it until i turned it on... The screen was blinking with no reason and some white and green stripes were flashing across the screen!!! I think the "NO WARRANTY" words in the cellphone description means "watch out we gonna get your money even if our product dont works"...
customer_reviews.author: Morenitha

customer_reviews.title: it's fine really I suppose
customer_reviews.text: This phone didn't come with jelly bean, but it installed it after I had been on my wifi network. Also, I have ATT in Florida and I don't get 4G with this phone. I do get HSPA however, which is almost as fast from a practical standpoint (I know not theoretically). I can play youtube videos no prob in real time. Biggest problem is there is no mobile hotspot app and I'm not sure if it supports that. If I had known this before I would not have gotten this phone, but would have got one specifically for AT&T. Oh well, it's fine really I suppose, but I wish I had known to do some homework first.
customer_reviews.author: Noggin the Nog

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: The Galaxy is the best phone on earth, I am an IT person who works with all phones on daily basis.. The Samsung Galaxy SIII and S4 are the most powerful phone we've ever tested, Full HD screen is the best in the business. Its plastic construction is a drawback and some of you might find it complicated to use, but there's no question that it's a seriously it is an amazing phone..
customer_reviews.author: Tom Smith

customer_reviews.title: es una vil copia. It is a vile copy
customer_reviews.text: buy it thinking it was original samsung but left very disappointed to see that it was nothing more than a cheap copy which to buy original price. lo compre creyendo que era original de samsung pero quede muy decepcionada al ver que no era mas que una copia barata la cual compre a precio de original!!!
customer_reviews.author: Astrid

customer_reviews.title: Mine was great. No promise what you will get...
customer_reviews.text: Your mileage may vary! I ordered this and received an S3 NEO, the dual SIM version. I was not expecting dual SIM. I didn't even know there was a dual SIM version. But as someone who travels internationally often, I am very happy to have it! The phone seems to work perfectly. My wife and I have had S3s for a couple years and we are very happy with its abilities.
customer_reviews.author: Ronbow

customer_reviews.title: Be ready to replace phone after ~ one year
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone in Sep 2013 and now, 16 months later, it's in an almost complete state of disrepair. For the past few months the phone hangs all the time (I have to reboot it when this happens) and the charging port is faulty so I'm forced to put the phone at a certain angle to charge it. It can also stay overnight being charged and still not get fully charged. In comparison, an iPhone 4S that we bought in October 2012 (one year before we bought the Samsung) is still going strong with no mechanical or software defects whatsoever,
customer_reviews.author: Victor S

customer_reviews.title: Este móvil me dio muchos problemas siendo nuevo le tuve ...
customer_reviews.text: Este móvil me dio muchos problemas siendo nuevo le tuve que arreglar el puerto usb y el boton de home. Me senti estafado......... This cell phone gave me a lot of trouble being new I had to fix the usb port and the button of home. I felt cheated me ........
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Luis R. Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Excelent
customer_reviews.text: Item came not only as described but BETTER. i bought this device for my wife and she absolutely loves it! she inst a tech girl but i am definitely a tech guy..... so i know what she has and she definitely has the best of the best! the screen size is awesome! the resolution on it is bright and brilliant! anyone looking for something top of the line, this is it! does everything u want it to do. the only down side i can say is the battery life. but even so i still gave it a 5 star review ;) enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: R. Ras

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit Dont buy!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this phone. Its a cheap counterfeit. My wife bought this phone less than a year ago and it is already having problems with the power button sticking and the phone turning off and on constantly. The silver paint around the edge is chipping away, and even the letters samsung on the back of the phone are coming off. I had the same phone from a different seller for almost 3 years with non of these problems
customer_reviews.author: kerry winters

customer_reviews.title: the quality of my signal bad.. aww
customer_reviews.text: The retailer of those gadgets do not give some important information, this phone has apparently been asked to lock on 2G...soo it barely works on the 3G my country works on..soo that's a mess...soo my internet is most of the time low..the quality of my signal bad..aww...tought i can't swith it on the settings on 3G or provider supported network...
customer_reviews.author: Vt

customer_reviews.title: I BOUGHT THE PHONE LAST MARCH AND WORKED FINE FOR TWO MONTHS THEN STARTED TO HAVE A PROBLEM ...
customer_reviews.text: DONT BUY FROM THIS SELLER. SELLING USED AND REPAIRED PHONES. I BOUGHT THE PHONE LAST MARCH AND WORKED FINE FOR TWO MONTHS THEN STARTED TO HAVE A PROBLEM IN CHARCHING THE PHONE AS AFTER KEEPING IT CHARGING THE WHOLE NIGHT I FOUND IT 10% ONLY!!! THOUGHT IT IS A CHARGER ISSUE, I BOUGHT A NEW CHARGER AND STILL FACING SAME ISSUE TILL IT IS NOT CHARGING AT ALL. TOOK THE PHONE FOR REPAIR AND THE SURPRISE THAT THE PHONE IS USED NOT NEW AND WAS REPAIRED BEFORE BY CHANGING SPARE PARTS INSIDE (CHARGING CYLCLE)
customer_reviews.author: XX

customer_reviews.title: incorrect  internal IMEI
customer_reviews.text: Good afternoon, I am writing to inform you of the problem with the cell phone to buy him, I presentouna failures and lead to the Samsung authorized service and cell phone review found that the IMEI code that has the tag attached to the barcode when cell phone is not the same IMEI code that has registered the cell phone, and for that reason does not guarantee them. Samsung told me that I contact you to me that my problem solution. I appreciate the solution of my problem as soon as possible. You are a company responsible for the sale of all kinds of product have to be equally responsible before these problems. Thank goodbye to you
customer_reviews.author: antonio baptista

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: 3 weeks later I never got a phone my requests for a refund have been ignored UPS says Straight Trading can only give me info Straight Trading says I have to contact UPS I'm tired of dealing with a lack of communication I feel disrespected and cheated out of my money now my husband wants to get our attorney involved over $269
customer_reviews.author: Zee

customer_reviews.title: Brand new BUT !!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got my order on time! My Samsung Galaxy s3 came in a brand new box with all his accessories but I dont know what kind of charger is that because it cannot be charged in America or Jamaica where I go back and forth regular, in-addition the phone is advertised as "Version" but I dont see any sign of "Version" on the phone therefore when I go to Jamaica I hope it is unlocked and I dont have to pay any expense to open the phone for it to make it work.... But all and all the phone seems brand new and I like it thus far so I will see what happens when i reach Jamaica. #Yup
customer_reviews.author: Roshane W. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: UNBELIEVABLE
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so upfront I must admit I have not had a smart phone before & many people gave me grief & would 'needle' me at work. This phone is absolutely & utterly AMAZING!!!!!!!!!!!! I can hardly believe the conveniences it provides. I took several photos today & the quality of the camera alone is astonishing!!! I feel "blessed" to have this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Average Joe

customer_reviews.title: Don't Waste Your Time, Only Good For Appearance !
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't recommend anyone to buy this phone . After severeal weeks of receiving it , it would randomly just restart continuously until I took the battery out . Also another fault with this phone is that it is VERY FRAGILE, the screen will crack in no time . Also, the battery swells very quickly .As a result , the back of the phone doesn't stay on . And it flickers in and out then freezes when it hits about 40% . Forcing the user , to remove the battery , plug the charger in and then restart it .Overall , this phone only lasted me about 7 months .
customer_reviews.author: Slim

customer_reviews.title: Really International
customer_reviews.text: It has many languages including Chinese in it, which is what I bought it for. Video playing is fast. The pictures are nice. No 'AT&T' on the back cover like some other Samsung galaxy 3. The battery is not bad as I expected. One shortcoming is the manual; it's in a language other than English or Chinese, which I can't understand at all. The other shortcoming is still about the language. It has some pre-installed apps in it; the apps are also in the language I can't understand. I can't delete those apps, I can only hide them.
customer_reviews.author: Qian

customer_reviews.title: Geat Deal on a Great Phone.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice phone, it comes with a European charger that has an adapter plub (one plug slips over the other) for North America. Other than the inconvinience of a slightly bulky charger, it's a great phone at a great price. Beautiful screen and feels very solid and well made. Samsung has created another top of the line Androind phone.
customer_reviews.author: J. pulfer

customer_reviews.title: Honestly it's a reasonable smart phone. Not high end but certainly will do
customer_reviews.text: It is a Samsung neo. Confused by what it would be. Honestly it's a reasonable smart phone. Not high end but certainly will do. It responds fast and screen is sharp. Connected to T-Mobile with micro card perfectly. Downloaded my favorite apps from Google and they work on the phone so I have zero complaint.
customer_reviews.author: janice399

customer_reviews.title: am very upset and dissatisfied, as the article that ...
customer_reviews.text: am very upset and dissatisfied, as the article that you buy is not what I expected, the phone has a totally corrupted system does not work does not start will not start, I feel cheated, and you spend what I consider a large sum in dollars in this article, to serve and not lose as much money as the phone, I thank my complaint is taken and somehow I be returned the money or an item that does work, I hope prompt response ....I'm from Venezuela and acquire this article is almost impossible that it trusts you make the purchase by this means, I demand response and solution ...
customer_reviews.author: Grecia Rengifo

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturing defect happened with this S3 and no reply from this seller.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this S3 in May 2013. It was good until last week (August 10) the screen didn't light up any more. Brought to the repairing shop and they said this was factory fault that they had seen in some S3s before. I contacted this seller for an answer. After getting a reply saying "You bought this phone from May, what do you want us to do at this point?", I clearly stated my problem, how specific the phone's defect was, and that I wanted to trade another well-working phone. Then they never respond to me though I tried to resend the email. Trying to contact Amazon customer services now.
customer_reviews.author: Phuong

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product, delivery timing and post sales attention
customer_reviews.text: The cellphone is amazing, easy to use, modern, resistant and with a beautiful design. I loved also that is not a heavy phone. The updates and the software in general is very fast to easy to do ti. My feedback also includes the On the Go Solution customer attention: the delivery time was amazing, and the post sales attention too. I'm not in US, and even in this situation, when I needed assistance to solve a doubt about the version provided of this device, the On the Go Solution did an exceptional customer attention and showed total accountability to help me. That is the best experience that one customer can have, and the telephone also, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jocely Seiler Nass

customer_reviews.title: Defective Product (Black Screen)
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this phone to replace my current Samsung Galaxy S3 that is draining batteries in under 25 minutes. The item arrived promptly with no damage to the box however when I removed the phone from the packaging and put the battery in it, it turned on but the screen remained black and you could still hear the touch sounds when trying to use the phone. After multiple power cycles, battery replacements and such I managed to get the phone to have a picture however the whole screen would flicker and had lopsided split screen effect. Unusable in this condition I am returning the product for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Power Button Issue
customer_reviews.text: The power button does not work well on my Galaxy S3. I understand that this is a common problem. To help to resolve the problem, I installed an app that is called "Knock Knock" which I use when I wish to put the phone to sleep. And I use the bottom middle button to wake the phone. This saves me from having to use the power button most of the time.
customer_reviews.author: user8981

customer_reviews.title: SCAMMERS!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: After having my phone just for months i realize that it is a fraud it dosent even have an original rom (ROM STOCK) from samsung so a can not update it through OTA and it says that it has ben modify so i cant do it by samsung kies either, as if that were not enough the battery got damage and when i bought the replacement battery it didnt even match with my phone or course because IT IS NOT A SAMSUNG GALAXY S3 wich i should imagine since the first day because the phone its white and it came in a blue box and without headphones so summarizing FRAUD FRAUD FRAUD!!!!!!! LIERS!!!
customer_reviews.author: Juan Semeco

customer_reviews.title: that disappointment, I bought this cel for my wife in ...
customer_reviews.text: that disappointment, I bought this cel for my wife in Dominican republic think it's the international vercion unlocked, is totally false not unlocked nor the i9300, I had to pay for the release and not the original advertising not working on 3g I always buy here, but another deception like this eh thinking what to keep buying this type of product.
customer_reviews.author: edwin collado

customer_reviews.title: junk!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this phone. The reception on this phone is horibbble. O wish i never bought it. I have another galaxy 3 very similar but not international. I get great reception with it in the same location. The imternatiomal one has big problems.
customer_reviews.author: Draggonfly

customer_reviews.title: Beware buyers
customer_reviews.text: These phones are used, lost a lot of money buying from this buy, Amazon take this seller off there ripping off people, said new but its used an cost the same as new phones. Very disappointing an hurt about it, dealing with amazon for years make me wonder what next to do. Take this buyer down an beware people there spammers.
customer_reviews.author: Chester

customer_reviews.title: swindler
customer_reviews.text: Your comments were "Good evening, I would explain to me how it is possible that the computer that sent me is inside Chinese. A copy. I was informed by a service technician to check the same and this raises no 3G (the Case) is a samsang externally. Worse operating system this is the sansung SIII difente offer NO indicates that the computer is NOT the original samsung. The USB cable is not a tablet this team, I want a solution to this deception, or fraud and that I was supposed to buy a Samsung Galaxy SIII ORIGINAL. Not a copy?
customer_reviews.author: Hector Acosta

customer_reviews.title: HELP Charger doesnt work
customer_reviews.text: I received the phone properly packaged and the phone appears to be ok. It turned on ok when I first attempted however the battery was low and upon leaving it to charge for about 2 hours I came back to find it lower than it was before and about to dischage. What appears to be a new charger is not charging the phone... HELP as I now cant access my phone !!!! I managed to transfer my contacts but thats been all. By the time I was ready to transfer my SIM Card and to download apps I want it had shutdown.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Campbell

customer_reviews.title: I returned this phone the day I got it. ...
customer_reviews.text: I returned this phone the day I got it. Its not new, there is dirt in the cracks under the back of this phone. Plus the home screen button didn't even work every time, maybe after pushing it 10 times you might get to your main screen
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly as described. it needs for the regular simcard to be cut (converted to micro simcard). It is extraordinary and I love it. Also the packaging was very good and arrived exactly on time
customer_reviews.author: Najwa

customer_reviews.title: ... cell was scratched- it has a program installed called super user (in root)
customer_reviews.text: The cell galaxy S3 i recieved was not in mint condition another words the screen on the cell was scratched- it has a program installed called super user (in root). i cant use the gauarentee on this cell phone becuase it had aleady an application aplied. a application program that is not legal.
customer_reviews.author: gabriel martinez

customer_reviews.title: this sucks, they promote a new cellphone and i received ...
customer_reviews.text: this sucks, they promote a new cellphone and i received an used one, no battery included and now after 6 months struggling with this piece of plastic whenever i try make a phone call or send a text message it says NOT REGISTERED ON NETWORK as if the cellphone was IMEI BLOCKED OR REPORTED, i demand to get a refund ASAP and an explanation for the inconvenient that this has caused to me, i thought this was a serious company.
customer_reviews.author: Roselis Aquino

customer_reviews.title: Phone does not turn on
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what to do. The device has never turned on. Nothing happens. I chatted with amazon that recommended to find out a solution with Samsung. Samsung in Brazil did not accept to fix imported devices. I also tried to a generic service center to test it, that gave me a feedback the device is damaged externally in the case. I am sure I unpacked correctly and never damaged it. I bought it when I was in the USA couple weeks ago. HELP ME PLEASE. I don't intend to pay more $ 500.00 to fix it complete.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Biazolli Junior

customer_reviews.title: Buy it , This version is powerful
customer_reviews.text: This phone is all that the reviews say it is. For this particular version I haven't figured out how to enable voice commands. The microphone doesn't readily appear like some of the other samsung phone I have had. I am sure it's just a download or a setting. Buy the phone .
customer_reviews.author: RK Alex

customer_reviews.title: Received different model with missing features!
customer_reviews.text: Received a different model! The listing doesn't say anything about dual SIM and I got "S3 NEO DUOS"... not much difference but for example it doesn't support screen shearing (option is simply missing from the settings) so it's missing features from the standard S3 model that they should have sent according to the description. The phone has a DUOS logo on the back that even the photos on this item listing doesn't show!
customer_reviews.author: RJJ

customer_reviews.title: phone
customer_reviews.text: s3 great phone, bought it used. got phone went to activate it, could not still activated, somewhere! I All I wanted was working phone I could use, Seller did give full refund but i am still without working cell phone, guess my fault trying to save money.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: It's actually unlocked
customer_reviews.text: I bought it from tech giant who was fulfilled by amazon and the phone is unlocked just as it's advertised but i ain't so sure if the phone is actually new because the box for the phone looks really old and used while the phone looks like a new one. Another thing is that the phone says that it's made in China and i'm not sure if it's supposed to be like that or if it should be made in Korea. It still has S-voice and everything just maybe made in China.
customer_reviews.author: TheLaw

customer_reviews.title: Piece of art!
customer_reviews.text: It's brand new as described, loves it, works perfectly and it is absolutely a very nice looking phone, it's functional and it has a very high quality screen. absolutely recomend this phone is a fine piece of art!
customer_reviews.author: Rommel

customer_reviews.title: It’s no unlocked phone don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: They mentioned it’s unlocked phone but it was not, I bought this phone for my dad to use in India but it never worked. I am so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the mobile gets too slow
customer_reviews.text: This phone is not as fast as I expected it to be at all.. As more applications are down loaded the mobile progressively turns slower and slower, despite the fact that enough internal memory is available. returning home from any application takes several seconds. in some occasions the phone restarts by itself. The Samsung voice app cannot be used with handsfree earplugs. And Samsung doesn't honor the warranty in Venezuela because the phone was not meant for use in Latinamerica.
customer_reviews.author: MARIA ESTELA CARRASQUERO

customer_reviews.title: Unknown european language in the manual and datasheets
customer_reviews.text: The phone is one of the best smart phones ever, but this international version isnt what I was expecting. The manual and datasheets are in a rare european language and the charger is for the european standar. It isnt a real problem because adapters can be used but I was really surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Guzman R.

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy S III
customer_reviews.text: Just got and it's work perfectly! It super light, it came in English, but with options to other languages. I have AT&T SIM chip and it worked fine (I had to change it for a Micro SIM tough, but they did for free at AT&T store). Not regret at all!
customer_reviews.author: Jamille Ilha

customer_reviews.title: i LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: IT IS AN AMAZING CELL PHONE, IT WAS BETTER THAN I EXPECT, THE ONLY PROBLEM WAS THAT IT WASN'T SENT THE CELL PHONE MANUAL BUT FOR EVERYTHING ELSE ITS GREAT.
customer_reviews.author: danny s.

customer_reviews.title: Samsung galaxy S3 factory unlocked international version white color
customer_reviews.text: While in U.S.A. my daughter purchased for my use in India Samsung Galaxy S3 international version unlocked white color online from Amazon.com. I tried to register it on U.S.A. website and on Indian website also, but cannot register it on either site with my Indian address. Please guide me. Also I am using it for last 15 days but even in standby mode battery does not last more than 5 hours. In reviews on the Internet before purchase I read that the standby time is 800 hours & talk time is 22 hours. Therefore, though the product is excellent otherwise, I am disappointed for the battery part. Please help.
customer_reviews.author: Sharad

customer_reviews.title: Samsung of Iphone everyday.
customer_reviews.text: We have had this phone now for almost 3 years and it still running. It has been thrown, dropped in the rain, used at the gym, flooded with sugar drinks in a purse. exposed to ridiculous humidity for the last couple years and so far its only had to be dried out a couple of nights. Damn fine product.
customer_reviews.author: alan

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It's not the original Samsung Galaxy s3 it's fake made by China.
customer_reviews.author: MOHAMMED EZIREJ

customer_reviews.title: and i really like this phone
customer_reviews.text: After 3 yrs with an S2, i upgraded, and i really like this phone, but i am not crazy about all the bloat ware they put on phones now. I will have to figure out how to root it
customer_reviews.author: Dana W

customer_reviews.title: Phone shipped not unlocked/international.
customer_reviews.text: The phone was described/sold as unlocked/international. The phone that was shipped is not unlocked/international. I am trying to work with SIM provided by the local Israeli network provider and the phone is asking for a SIM network unlock PIN. I contacted WorldWide Distributors - Amazon Marketplace and supplied them with the phone's IMEI code. and requested a PIN code.They have not yet provided me with the PIN. I expect Amazon to get involved to expedite/solve the problem - or refund my money.
customer_reviews.author: goldie

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: The Samsung Galaxy S III is the ideal smartphone. It's stylish, durable, fast and tech savvy. The international unlocked phone is great....it works perfectly with my local (bmobile) SIM Card. I recommend the supplier, FGS Trading Inc. for supplying quality products with prompt delivery!
customer_reviews.author: T. Hull

customer_reviews.title: user friendly model
customer_reviews.text: Although I am first time user of the Android phone , I research a lot before buying this set , I think I am right with the reveiws guided me well . the phone is working very well. it is very user friendly and guide me all the time to the proper way. but the only problem is the battery that burn out within one day . otherwise the phone is alright.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shipped on time with no issues
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift to my wife (B'day). Got fed up with AT&T contracts. Now I'm happy and can move to any carrier. Only thing got concern is, when I open it first time saw some Asian language settings. Other than that everything is good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: wrong Offer
customer_reviews.text: Good, the next email is to make mention of my displeasure with you to buy my S3, since I bought it with the specifications and to be used RELEASED INTERNATIONALLY, and I got the same BLOCKED, I wrote several emails and made fools , giving me a bizarre answers, so the catalog as lousy dealer or seller who offered unlocked phone is a lie!! and also I add that cost me $ 45 to unlock my phone in Venezuela, so you should take care of my extra expense!
customer_reviews.author: Desiree T Ledezma O

customer_reviews.title: Brand new? Yeah right
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with the fact that it does not charge! it's a brand new phone, and the battery doesn't hold more than 1 hour. I've bought another battery and still doesn't charge properly. Sincerely i will never buy from this supplier, or from Amazon for this matter.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Hincapie

customer_reviews.title: This is not an international version
customer_reviews.text: I'm so upset with the seller of this phone. This is not the international version. I was not able to return it as I bought something for another country, I dont live in the US, I wanted to use it on my country and I was not able to do it. I dont know why amazon have not blocked this seller already. They are selling something that is not what they described it.
customer_reviews.author: Karina Perez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I choose this phone as a gift for my brother and he likes it very much....Although I heard some negative comments about factory unlocked products from amazon but in my case it was more then OK...and the Galaxy S3 is a nice android version...and I have found S4 got no big difference in compare to S3...so I strongly recommend to choose this phone...
customer_reviews.author: Md Gulam Musawwir Khan

customer_reviews.title: Good cell phone
customer_reviews.text: Good cell phone, only con is it will start laggin after a few months of use, full reset and it goes fast again, sold it and got myself an lg nexus 4, no lag there

customer_reviews.title: defective screen
customer_reviews.text: Good night, to notify you that I had a problem with a white Samsung Galaxy S3. Orde # 113-2486195-9662637 The phone I get defective screen. I turn it, the two lower buttons light up but the screen does not light, was a technician checked and told me that the screen is damaged. I bought more than 7 phones in their store and I have never had any problem until now I expect a prompt response.

customer_reviews.title: At 1st day the battery charged 100% after that it goes up to 80% and it stays the same and when I remove the charger it goes to
customer_reviews.text: A problem with the battery and charger adapter and back cover. At 1st day the battery charged 100% after that it goes up to 80% and it stays the same and when I remove the charger it goes to different percentages like 60% or 76%

customer_reviews.title: Best phone I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This phone was an upgrade from a Nexus One and I couldn't be happier with my purchase. It's fast, has a great battery life and a beautiful screen. The firmware updated a few weeks ago to Jelly Bean (4.1.1). Everyday I discover more features and reasons to be happy with my purchase. I have been using this phone for almost 3 months.

Buy a supposedly reliable computer and I get an unusable cellular repair in Vzla which is more expensive than buying the phone. Therefore I demand they send me another phone. Instruct me what should I do

customer_reviews.title: The product was advertized as "at&t unlocked for any gsm ...
customer_reviews.text: The product was advertized as "at&t unlocked for any gsm service in the country or overseas (i747 version)." However, it arrived locked. I had to contact the seller to get the code to unlock it partially since it only enabled me to use the phone. I can't do much with the phone including copying the pictures I took with it, updating the OS, tethering, etc. The seller did not help me to solve these issues.

customer_reviews.text: they sent me the "Samsung Galaxy S III/S3 GT-I9300 Factory Unlocked Phone" international version. it was from mexico and was from the service provider "iusacell" google it. anyways the phone was locked and wouldnt even let me update it. i tried unlocking it but they hid it from me pretty good. dont buy from world wide distributors. you wont get what you expect. dont fall for there rouse like i did.

customer_reviews.title: FAULTY

I AM LEFT TO BELIEVE THAT THE BATTERY IS NOT GOOD AND NOW HAVE TO PURCHASE A NEW ONE,HOPES THIS SOLVES THE PROBLEM. SO BUYERS BEWARE.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Phone
customer_reviews.text: My first 'smartphone.' Had asked friends/family what they're using. This one kept coming up. Did some research before buying. Have been very please with its handling and performance. It's fast! Only down is the low battery life. HAVE to plug it in every other day (even with Bluetooth off). Otherwise really enjoy it.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: GOT MY S111 in no time at all & just as described but even better!!! It has so many options it will always have something new for me to learn. Not difficult to operate just sooooo much in such a small sleek gadget!Ha!I will never want or ever need anything else in a cellphone.The Galaxy has it all!!Terrie

customer_reviews.title: NOTHING BUT PROBLEM FROM THE START

WHEN I CHOSE TO BUY IT, IT WAS DESCRIBE AS A NEW PHONE BUT WHEN I RECEIVED IT I COULD TELL IT WAS USED BUT I NEEDED THE PHONE SO I KEPT IT BUT WHAT A DISAPOINTMENT THIS HAS BEEN!!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Phone was delivered promptly and was as factory unlocked as described. Worked perfectly on my 3g and 4g network. Would definitely recommend to anyone who is looking for a similiar unlocked device.

customer_reviews.title: It is a perfect phone
customer_reviews.text: It is a perfect phone meets all expectations, the tools of visualization, communication, games, social networking, the operating system is very fast, the quality and speed of the camera is great. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: im

customer_reviews.title: Great Cell-Phone
customer_reviews.text: Hi, I got the Galaxy S3, charged the battery, put my old SIM and started the device. It works perfectly, after a few second the Phone asked whether to update its Opereatin System from 4.2 to 4.2.1. 2 minutes after it ran with the latest OS. This is a great phone. Pros: great performance. Easy to use. Cons: The battery last less than a day with a moderate use. a bit expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Cohen

customer_reviews.title: I love my Samsung!
customer_reviews.text: After debating for months, I decided to go for the Samsung Galaxy III and I'm not sorry for even one minute. The Android OS is simple and intuitive, and the phone's features are amazing. The camera's photos come out bright and sharp and the video has excellent sound as well. The minor drawback is that it the screen is a bit large and doesn't easily fit into a pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Smith Ziv

customer_reviews.title: Great deal on recent phone
customer_reviews.text: As New. Still very useful tech at a steep discount.

customer_reviews.title: freezing smartphone
customer_reviews.text: i ordered the Galaxy S3 but unfortunalty whenever it went to standby mode - it was frozen and had to be restarted. i tried to look in many forums how to solve the problem and didn't figure out. on one forum it said it might be a motherboard problem. i shiped it back and got my money back. finally - problems happpens from time to time. i hope when i buy another one i will not face the same problem again

customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for free phone that can work anywhere and you are into the edge og technlogy just go for it, Shop best delivered this phone in just one day dispite of the fact i had chosen 5 day standard shipping i put in my order on the 24 feb at 11pm got shipped on 25 and delivered on 27th, It was more than I had expected in terms of speed. Am loving it, it came with french manual, usb, ear phones

customer_reviews.title: Great phone!
customer_reviews.text: I received it just the other day and I love it already! Great phone, and in great shape! I couldn't have asked for a better one! My only concern is the USB cable that was sent with it goes into the phone with difficulty and feels stuck when I try to take it out. I'm sure it'll go away or loosen up after a few times so I'm not too worried. I would recommend this phone to anyone, in fact I already did. To my dad and my brother. Great phone!

It even came with the screen protector(not the sticker of samsung) and clear marks that somebody had used it before. I am traveling this week, so I won't have time to wait for another phone. I really don't recommend this seller.

product_meta.title: Samsung Galaxy S3 16GB GSM Unlocked - (White)
product_meta.description: The Samsung Galaxy S III GT-I9300 cell phone sees, listens, and responds to your requirements. A front-facing camera on this Samsung Galaxy S works with the Smart Stay feature to adjust the brightness, staying on till you are done with browsing or reading. Sharing content with other S III users is as simple as touching the backs of two Samsung Galaxy S III GT-I9300 cell phones. Enjoy multitasking with the Pop up Play feature of this 16 GB Samsung Galaxy S smartphone that lets you chat with friends, watch HD videos, and surf the web simultaneously. With the Smart Alert feature, this white smartphone alerts you of any missed calls or messages received in your absence. Furthermore, you can answer a call or reject it, set the alarm or snooze it, and do lots more by simply giving out voice commands. Running on the Android 4.0 OS, this marble white Samsung Galaxy S III phone enables you to truly enjoy various applications on its wide 4.8-inch HD super AMOLED touchscreen.
feature_bullets: Unlocked cell phones are compatible with GSM carriers such as AT&T and T-Mobile, but are not compatible with CDMA carriers such as Verizon and Sprint.
This cell phone may not include a US warranty as some manufacturers do not honor warranties for international version phones. Please contact the seller for specific warranty information.
